summary: The diff shows only backend changes (main.mo) and project_state.json updates. No frontend chat implementation is present. All chat-related requirements (REQ-1, REQ-2, REQ-3) are completely missing from the implementation.

missing_requirements.requirement: Restore the chat functionality with AI-powered responses using the existing useChatSessions hook pattern
missing_requirements.reason: No frontend chat components, hooks, or AI response logic implemented. The diff only contains backend game/profile management code with no chat-related functionality.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the ChatPage component correctly integrates ChatSidebar and ChatView with session management and navigation
missing_requirements.reason: No ChatPage, ChatSidebar, or ChatView components are present in the diff. No session management or navigation logic for chat.

missing_requirements.requirement: Verify the chat route (/chat) is properly configured in the TanStack Router setup and accessible from the main navigation
missing_requirements.reason: No routing configuration changes present in the diff. No chat route setup or HomePage navigation links implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Fix any deployment issues that caused the previous version 46 build to fail, ensuring successful compilation and network deployment
missing_requirements.reason: While backend code appears syntactically valid, no evidence of frontend chat implementation means the build cannot satisfy the BuildRequest. No deployment configuration or build fixes are visible in the diff.

hallucinated_features.description: Extensive backend game management system with Game CRUD operations
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly states constraints to maintain existing patterns and non-goals exclude adding features beyond chat restoration. The diff implements createGame, updateGame, deleteGame, getAllGames functions that were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: User profile management system with UserProfile type and profile CRUD operations
hallucinated_features.reason: User profile functionality (getCallerUserProfile, getUserProfile, saveCallerUserProfile) was not part of the chat feature rebuild request and appears to be unrelated to the specified requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Authorization mixin and access control system
hallucinated_features.reason: While access control might be useful, it was not requested in the BuildRequest. The constraints specify maintaining existing patterns, not adding new authorization layers.
